articles.title: Presidential election: Yashwant Sinha gets a jolt from 8 opposition parties
articles.description: Combined opposition candidate for the presidential election, Yashwant Sinha, who filed his nomination on Monday, received a setback when at least eight non-National Democratic Alliance (NDA) parties did not send their representatives on the occasion.
